sgcool_label_text:This booklet was published by the Ministry of Culture to communicate the new government’s messages and larger concerns regarding the state of the nation. The importance of Merger between Singapore and Malaya is discussed here
 with the year leading up to it an important one for a decision to be taken by Singapore. This booklet was the sixth of the Towards Socialism series by the Ministry of Culture.   This booklet was published by the Ministry of Culture to communicate the new government’s messages and larger concerns regarding the state of the nation. The importance of Merger between Singapore and Malaya is discussed here
 with the year leading up to it an important one for a decision to be taken by Singapore. This booklet was the sixth of the Towards Socialism series by the Ministry of Culture.

The importance of Merger between Singapore and Malaya is discussed here, with the year leading up to it an important one for a decision to be taken by Singapore. This booklet was the sixth of the Towards Socialism series by the Ministry of Culture.   This booklet was published by the Ministry of Culture to communicate the new government’s messages and larger concerns regarding the state of the nation. The importance of Merger between Singapore and Malaya is discussed here, with the year leading up to it an important one for a decision to be taken by Singapore. This booklet was the sixth of the Towards Socialism series by the Ministry of Culture.
